item.title: Who is this person named Storm running APOSbot.com? (RSC bot)
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

“Jagex IP”? Intellectual property?

Also, do you know for sure that Storm is genodemon?

I haven’t seen a trace of a “ruler”, perhaps if you guys provide alt nicknames he may be under, then he might be around … perhaps he’s this “RLN” guy?

item.title: Who is this person named Storm running APOSbot.com? (RSC bot)
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:4, topic:553933”][quote author=mopmans little slave link=topic=672855.msg4499483#msg4499483 date=1448401089]

ah, so storm’s still around

he was on the tarc irc channel for a few years on freenode with a few others including bloodrayne and myself

then he just kind of ghosted out, glad to see he’s still around and kicking
[/quote]

is bloodrayne still around???[/quote]yeah

I know next to no one on this apos community, but to name a few more prominent figures in this community (just going off the post count): Storm, RLN, K Steg, sellwud, aaronsc, blood (probably bloodrayne, since he wrote a lot of scripts), abyte0, grassy
